channel.title: drawing on Lilie Artsci's blog
channel.description: Recent content in drawing on Lilie Artsci's blog

item.title: Insects
item.description: Hey there, I recently took an online class by Laura McKendry, whose style I love and I find so loose and fresh, and for that class I made a couple of drawings about insects. I discovered how much fun they are to paint or draw! This first one I painted with watercolor the basic shape I wanted to do, and then I drawed with pencils on top. In this second one, I tried to paint them walking in different directions and to look more lively :)

item.title: Psycho-cat
item.description: Hey! Here is a small drawing of my cat, whose favorite posture is to lie on the back. She’s often in that weird mood in-between cuddly and psycho-cat, lying a trap full of claws when we try to pet it :)
